documents.title: monday 's weather : misty , murky , mild and muggy
text: most places will have a dull and damp start , with cloudy skies and some light rain and drizzle .
this afternoon will be drier and possibly brighter as some sunny spells start to develop .
top temperature : 20c ( 68f ) .
get a full forecast where you live , from bbc weather .
author: Sara Thornton
BBC Weather

text: welcome to our live coverage from across the county .
among the stories we 'll be taking a closer look at :
but as ever , we 'll start the day with a look at the weather prospects - is it going to stay grey all day ?
sara thornton will be here next to tell us all what 's in store
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

text: that 's all from the local live teams for the week .
we 're now taking a break for the weekend and will return at 08:00 on monday .
we hope you 've enjoyed our coverage .

documents.title: stolen tortoise prompts microchip appeal
text: stolen tortoise prompts microchip appeal

documents.title: teenager charged with driving offences following police pursuit
text: an 18-year-old man has been charged with six offences following a police pursuit on the outskirts of ipswich yesterday .
shortly before 14:00 police tried to stop a blue ford focus near the junction of main road and bell lane , kesgrave .
it failed to stop and crashed with a police motorcycle .
the car also caused damaged to a black bmw before it was stopped on purdis farm lane .
two teenagers were arrested and an 18-year-old from north essex has been charged with driving offences .
a 17-year-old boy from the saxmundham area has been released under investigation .

documents.title: travellers served with court summons
text: travellers who set up camp on an overflow car park in walton-on-the-naze have been served with a court summons .
the group was served with a `` direction to leave '' on wednesday but remained on land at the columbine centre , owned by tendring district council .
the group has been told it must leave or attend court on monday .

documents.title: knife held to shopkeeper 's throat during armed robbery
text: a shopkeeper managed to escape unharmed after having a knife held to his throat during a robbery in southend .
shortly after 02:00 two men entered costcutter on london road .
they then threatened the shopkeeper while money was stolen from the till .
the first suspect was described as white and he wore a blue converse hooded top , blue tracksuit trousers and grey trainers .
the second suspect was also white and wore a cream hooded top with black sleeves and adidas stripes , blue adidas tracksuit trousers and blue shoes .
both men had pulled the hoods of their tops over their faces .
anyone with information has been asked to contact essex police or crimestoppers anonymously .

documents.title: man jailed for andy carroll robbery bid
text: man jailed for andy carroll robbery bid

documents.title: jury concludes prisoner 'died from natural causes '
text: an inquest jury has concluded an inmate at chelmsford prison died of natural causes .
john ajidahun , from grays , was found collapsed in his cell in september last year .
the 27-year-old had a serious and rare heart disease .
jurors were asked to consider whether his death could have been prevented .

documents.title: andy carroll chase caught on video
text: andy carroll chase caught on video

documents.title: the latest weather forecast : sunshine and showers
text: there 'll be heavy showers this afternoon , mostly near the coast , with sunny spells in the west of the county .
feeling warm , with the mercury expected to rise to 20c ( 68f ) .
weather has further details for you .
visit here to find out how you , too , can be one of our weather watchers - in the meantime , we hope you enjoy this selection of photos from around the county

documents.title: essex update
text: there 's good and bad news following our earlier technical problems .
bear with us - we 're back on air , but are still unable to play any of our usual jingles and tracks , or recorded voice reports .
we 've still got problems with our 0300 200 4041 number , so it 's best to text if you wish to contact us .
a reminder of that number - 81333 , and start your text with `` essex '' .

documents.title: mushroom forager in hospital after eating deadly fungus
text: a woman received hospital treatment for several days after accidentally eating a death cap mushroom .
the southend resident , who 's an experienced mushroom was foraging in hockley woods when she the poisonous mushroom by mistake .
she 's now said to be recovering well .
the borough council says residents should be cautious when foraging for food , and if they 're in any doubt , do n't eat it .
it also advises that foraging should only undertaken with the consent of the land owner , and that plants in sites of special scientific is prohibited .
the death cap - or amanita phalloides - is the most deadly fungus known .
eating just half of one can lead to death .

documents.title: oyster harvest set to begin
text: colchester celebrates one of its oldest annual traditions today - the opening of the colne oysteries fisheries ceremony .
the gin and gingerbread ceremony dates back some 500 years , with the mayor and town sergeant taking part in full regalia .
it marks the start of this year 's oyster harvest .

documents.title: a chilly night marks the start of autumn
text: today marks the start of meteorological autumn and this was reflected in the overnight temperatures .
santon donwham , on the norfolk-suffolk border , had the coldest night since 15 may , as this tweet from weatherquest 's dan holley shows .
how cold was it where you live ?
e anglia : a chilly start to meteorological autumn santon downham dipped down to 3.2c , while 40 miles away cromer fell no lower than 11.4c
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: breakingfurther arrest in murder inquiry
text: detectives investigating the murder of a man in south ockendon have made a sixth arrest .
a 21-year-old woman was arrested on sus of murder in snaresbrook , london yesterday .
police were called to eden green , south ockendon , on monday , 21 august following reports a man suffered serious knife injuries .
the victim , daniel adger , 34 , was taken to hospital but died .
a post-mortem examination found he died as a result of multiple injuries .
one man 's already been charged with murder while four others have also been questioned .

documents.title: appeal for second lorry following m11 death
text: police have issued this image of a second lorry they want to trace in connection with a fatal crash on the m11 near harlow yesterday .
they believe the driver may have witnessed a crash between a car and a motorbike , in which the motorcyclist was killed .
they are also appealing for information about a lorry with a black trailer , which had an image of a fruit - possibly a tomato .
anyone with dashcam footage , or witnesses to the collision , are asked to contact essex police or call crimestoppers .

documents.title: technical problems affecting bbc essex output
text: essex is experiencing technical problems this morning and we 're not sure how long the disruption will last .
the phone system is also affected , so callers to the regular 0300 200 4041 number wo n't be able to get through .
instead , you can text 81333 , starting your message with the word `` essex '' , and someone will call you back .
we 'll keep you posted with any developments .

documents.title: high street banks to close
text: barclays bank has confirmed that six of its branches in essex are to close in the coming months .
customers in halstead ( will lose their branch today , with pitsea closing on 8 december .
branches in dovercourt , tilbury , rochford and waltham abbey will close by the end of the year .
the bank says customers increasingly use online , telephone and mobile devices for their banking services , and the closures will keep them relevant and competitive .

documents.title: weather : a mostly dry and bright day
text: a cool start to the day , with early morning mist patches soon clearing .
sunny spells , with the risk of showers in eastern areas .
feeling pleasantly warm , with temperatures peaking at 20c ( 68f ) .
weather has a more detailed forecast for where you are .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: good morning essex
text: hello and thanks for joining us for friday 's essex live .
throughout the day we 'll have the latest news updates from around the county .
do you have a story you 'd like to share with us ?
click on the `` get involved '' button at the top of the page to get in touch .
there 's a distinctly autumnal nip to the weather this morning , but what about the rest of the day ?
elizabeth rizzini 's forecast follows shortly .
author: Caroline Kingdon
BBC Local Live

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: thanks for following our coverage .
our regular news updates will return at 08:00 tomorrow morning , but scroll down to catch up on anything you may have missed .
see you again after 40 winks .

documents.title: overnight weather : chilly with showers , clearing by midnight
text: it will be a bright end to the day for many areas .
heavy , slow-moving showers will affect some parts of the region , although these will clear by midnight .
it will be chilly tonight , with lows of 7c ( 45f ) .
friday will start cold , but bright .
showers will develop later - some heavy and thundery .
top temperature : 22c ( 72f ) .
get the full forecast where you live at bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: porter propels essex closer to title
text: porter propels essex closer to title

documents.title: breakingm11 : motorcyclist dies at scene of crash
text: a man has died in a serious crash between a car and a motorbike , near junction 7 of the m11 at harlow .
the motorcyclist , a man in his 50s from nottingham , died at the scene .
essex police closed the road while officers investigated the collision , but it has now re-opened .
insp danny parsons said police urgently need to trace a lorry in connection with the incident , which was travelling southbound at the time .
the lorry had a black trailer with an image of fruit on it , possibly a tomato .
anyone who has information about the lorry , or dashcam footage of the crash , has been asked to contact essex police or crimestoppers anonymously .

documents.title: tour of britain : mark cavendish returns from injury
text: mark cavendish will return to action in the tour of britain for the first time since fracturing his scapula in a high-speed crash at the tour de france in july .
he 's to lead team dimension data at the ovo energy tour of britain , which begins on sunday in edinburgh .
stage 5 of the race comes to essex on thursday , 7 september , with tendring hosting an 16km ( 10 mile ) individual time trial with riders racing against the clock .
the route starts and finishes in clacton-on-sea .
stage 6 of the race will take place ( almost ) entirely within suffolk on friday , 8 september .

the 183km ( 113 mile ) stage will head east from newmarket to finish in aldeburgh , via a brief excursion through fordham in cambridgeshire , and then onto mildenhall , bury st edmunds , eye , framlingham , ipswich , woodbridge , saxmundham and leiston .
